name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Gerald HOWELL, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Gerald HOWELL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of September, 2004, the appeal is DISMISSED as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Esq., Philadelphia, for Gerald Howell.
Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
858 A.2d 74
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Gerald HOWELL, Appellant.

Sept. 21, 2004.
Norris E. Gelman, Esq., Philadelphia, for Gerald Howell.
Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Philadelphia, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
